sectionRegister.Content: With just a few simple registration steps, you can join the largest social networking community in Vietnam. With a wide range of features, excellent service.

sectionFeature.subTitle1: Enjoy shopping on the app Convenient - safe - fast
sectionFeature.subTitle2: Ordering your favorite food has never been so easy!
sectionFeature.subTitle3: With many attractive programs and discounts, you will have your favorite items right away
sectionFeature.subTitle4: Customers are always the focus of VietGroup, customers are always supported promptly - quickly - enthusiastically.
sectionFeature.subTitle5: With a variety of services from opening Visa, offering Tours to offering entertainment services.
sectionFeature.subTitle6: With many attractive programs and discounts, you will have your favorite items right away

sectionFeatureDetail.description: A quick look at VietGroup's existing features
sectionFeatureDetail.subContent1: You will be given the shortest route to get to the supermarket of your choice
sectionFeatureDetail.subContent2: Now, going to the supermarket and shopping for goods is no longer difficult because there is a Shopping Cart feature, which allows you to shop for essential items through just one application.
sectionFeatureDetail.subContent3: You do not have to waste time thinking about which supermarket to go with VietGroup's Suggestive feature, we will find the Supermarket with the closest and most convenient route.
sectionFeatureDetail.subContent4: You can make friends and chat with the entire VietGroup community, join and make friends in all four directions.
sectionFeatureDetail.subContent5: You can share your personal articles and thoughts with all your friends and relatives. With emotions - extremely diverse activities
sectionFeatureDetail.subContent6: Not only monotonous status lines, now you can also share your personal photos / videos on VietGroup.
sectionFeatureDetail.subContent7: You can order food wherever you want, now it's easier than ever to sit at home and enjoy delicious food
sectionFeatureDetail.subContent8: At Vietgroup always provide customers with promotions and discounts. You do not need to pay attention to the price, to enjoy your meals at Vietgroup.
sectionFeatureDetail.subContent9: Based on your preferences and eating habits, Vietgroup will provide you restaurants with food and drink suitable for your personal preferences.

sectionRating.customer_feedback_content: I like to use VietGroup application, through the application I can make many new friends, this place helps me share my very own thoughts and feelings.
